Entries.Introduction: Huh? Oh you're the farmer, well it's nice to meet you.#$e#My name is Idia Shroud, I wonder... What fruits you can make. Or vegtables.#$e#Can you produce Bloxyfruits, like in those games?$h

Entries.summer_Tue: I consider him as my brother evern though we look so different.#$e#Even if we don't talk much.
Entries.summer_Tue4: Idia hardly ever talks to anybody.#$e#It's almost like he doesn't know the real world exists.

Entries.spring_23: Tomorrow is the flower dance, I honestly find it so embarrasing to dance in public.
Entries.event_city4: Huh... You sound like my Mom.$a#$b#...*sigh*$s#$b#Maybe one cigarette won't kill me.$s

Entries.Fri: You've met my step son Idia, right? He lives downstairs.#$e#He doesn't really hang out with anybody but his anime friend.
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss Idia... He was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in him.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found a lot of burnt cigarettes in Idia's room and it's concerning.#$e#Sometimes I worry about Idia... He doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about his future very much...#$e#I would talk to him about it but he never opens up to me.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: Idia told me he's trying to quit his addiction to smoking! I'm glad.
Entries.winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I think the farm life is really healthy for Idia.

Entries.Indoor_Night_Sebastian: #$c .5#I may be a introvert, but I'm always happy when you're around.$h#$e#Hi, @. Nice to meet you. It's nice and quiet when you're around.$h

Entries.Rainy_Night_0: I'm trying my best to smoke less now that we're married... I don't wanna die on you! It's a bad habit.#$e#Please believe in me....$l
Entries.Outdoor_3: I don't want poor lungs now that im married to you. Maybe I should throw my lighter away#$e#Just an idea...$h
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to being a father. Don't worry, I'll take good care of %kid1! It's just... something new.
Entries.Good_3: I don't often show it, but I'm really happy that I'm your husband. Marrying you was the best decision I ever made.$l
Entries.Bad_8: I started smoking again... I've just been really stressed out lately.$s
